title: Drawing, "A fantastical perspective view of a terrace", 1820–50
medium: -a: pencil, brush, bistre; -b: black crayon, pencil
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal rectangle. -a: the woman is shown seated in the open between trees. She holds the distaff and book in her lap, but looks toward left.-b: verso, vertically: a pilaster with gaines of bearded men is at left. A terrace is shown through an arch.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "A fantastical perspective view of a terrace", 1820–50.-a: pencil, brush, bistre; -b: black crayon, pencil. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-215.
